nodes.text: Playland Theatre was an establishment located in a seedy part of the Coruscant Underworld. It was situated next to Purple Werm. A run-down, luminous, blue Aurebesh sign stated the name of the establishment.
During the Clone Wars, bounty hunter Cad Bane stayed in an apartment right across the street from Playland Theatre, while planning a mission to break into the Jedi Temple and steal a holocron.
